title: Teapot
description: nearly flat foot; cylindrical shaped, with small shoulder near mouth; long, nearly straight spout; double intertwined handle; cover has knob shaped like pinecone in dark red with dark red leaves; pot decorated with spray of purple and dark red flowers with green leaves on each side; band in dark red at bottom; delicate wavy rope-like band in dark red on shoulder with tiny purple and dark red flowers and grey solid band below mouth; cover decorated with wavy organic foliate band in dark red, solid dark red band, red dots and blue leaf shapes around edge; cover may not match pot; for the American market
